resources.string: Start Red Packet Assistant for Wechat
Need to open Red Packet Assistant services!
Please find "Red Packet Assistant" and then start the service.
Snatch red packets automatically if opened.
Snatch private chat red packets if opened.
Rings when red packets are snatched.
Records all the red packets and money snatched.
If set Wechat group as avoid-disturb mode,
or set the phone as avoid-disturb mode,
Your account may be freezed if the duration of snatching red packets is too short!
It\'s safer to set the duration to "2-8s(Randomly)"
Please open Red Packet Assistant in Accessibility in Settings.
View Details(Only support Wechat(version 6.3.8 or below)
Snatch automatically in single chat, notifying only in group chat.
Snatch automatically in group chat, notifying only in single chat.
Inform to snatch on your own(Prevent your account from being freezed)
1. Why it cannot snatch red packets automatically when turned on the red packet assistant?
2. Why it cannot snatch red packets automatically in QQ?
2. Why it cannot snatch packets if I signed onto Wechat(PC ver.)?
3. It\'s too annoying with tons of group messages. What should I do?
5. Why it cannot snatch red packets when the screen is locked?
You have to turn on "New Message Alert" and "Notification Center" in Wechat Settings. Meanwhile you should trun off "Mute Notifications" in the Group you want to snatch red packets automatically.

Please make sure you have already turned on \"Message Previews\" in \"Notifications\" in Settings. Also, you should choose \"Receive with Remind\" in \"Notifications\" in the group you want the assistant to snatch red packets automatticaly.
If you have logged in Wechat on PC, please click the top message notifying that you have signed onto Windows (or Mac) Wechat on your phone, then turn off \"Mute Notifications\".
You can turn off "Sound" and "In-App Vibrate" in "Notifications" in Wechat Settings.
2. You can turn off "Sound" and "Vibrate" in "Sound" in "Notifications" in QQ Settings.
1. If you have lock screen with password, the assistant cannot snatch red packets automatically. If you want so, you should clear your pattern password or number password in lock screen.
2. For those who have lock screnn with fingerprint, please clear those fingerprints or keep the phone unlocked if you want the assistant to snatch red evelopes automatically.
You are in the page ofDetails
